DOC.brief_summary: The transversus abdominis plane block ( TAP block ) effective method postoperative pain management cesarean section ( C-section ) . Up , data available bupivacaine ( BPV ) plasma level TAP block adult . In current study , investigator aim assess BPV pharmacokinetic parameter ultrasound-guided TAP block use BPV parturients undergo C-section report effect correct QT interval .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics BPV Following Bilateral US-guided TAP Block C-section
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator lead prospective observational study pregnant woman undergo elective C-section spinal anesthesia ( SA ) use 10 mg hyperbaric BPV . After surgery , receive bilateral ultrasound-guided TAP block 50 mg BPV side . Venous blood sample collect immediately 10 , 30 , 45 , 60 , 90 , 120 , 180 , 240 , 720 1440 minute TAP block . The investigator use high performance liquid chromatography ( HPLC ) measure BPV total plasma concentration . Mean BPV area curve ( AUC ) calculate 0 24 hour accord linear trapezoidal rule . Mean peak total BPV plasma concentration ( Cmax ) time reach peak ( Tmax ) record . Electrocardiographic ( ECG ) recording also repeat 1 , 2 , 3 4 hour investigate effect BPV correct QT ( QTc ) interval . Data compute use SPSS 20® . Quantitative data express mean ± SD . Qualitative data express percentage .
DOC.criteria: ASA physical status III pregnant woman schedule elective Csection Pfannenstiel incision Spinal anesthesia ASA physical status > II , know allergy local anesthetic , body mass index ( BMI ) 40 kg/m² , coagulation disorder , neurologic neuromuscular disease , significant liver renal dysfunction , electrolyte disturbance , heart arrhythmia , correct QT ( QTc ) interval > 0.47s patient take drug may prolong QT interval .
